titles.title: Possessions Wage Credit Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to replace the possession tax credit with a wage-based employment tax credit.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1594-1595)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Possessions Wage Credit Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a possessions employment credit for wages paid or incurred by an employer for services performed by an employee within a possession of the United States, if such employee is a bona fide resident of such possession and is subject to its tax on income from sources within and without such possession. Terminates the Puerto Rico and possession tax credit.
